Headline: Red Line Trains bypassing Garfield Station
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Garfield due to police department activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Garfield due to police department activity.

Shuttle buses have been requested between 95th and Cermak-Chinatown to provide connecting service.

See station personnel for further assistance.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
